tn.ref: Should you be helping the wicked? Should you be loving those who hate Yahweh?
tn.text: AT: "You should not help the wicked! You should not love those who hate Yahweh!" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:2ch:14:01|14:3]]

tn.ref: let the fear of Yahweh be upon you
tn.text: AT: "You should remember to fear Yahweh when you judge"

tn.ref: anger will come toward you and toward your brothers
tn.text: AT: "God will be angry with you ante your brothers"
